section.p: You ease the door open with bated breath, fearing at any moment that something horrible will leap out to confront you. But the snake was as good as its word - or as good as its thought, rather. Beyond the door lies a heap of treasure amounting to . Add this sum to your Adventure Sheet.
There you are, says the snake telepathically. You sense an undercurrent of satisfaction in its mind. Has it tricked you somehow? Is there an even greater treasure behind the other door?

choices.choice: Open the other closed door as well
